Description:
Perform commercial and contractual analysis, schedule evaluation of quotations, and incorporate technical evaluations.
Select appropriate suppliers for the project to obtain standard production materials at reasonable prices.
Handle the project work, deliverables, deadlines, and materials to ensure proper completion of the project according to the procurement plan.
Handle the necessary technical and contractual evaluations as per the project requirements.Skills
Skills:
Effective verbal and written communication skills.
Must be able to examine project drawings and material bills to determine the exact requirements needed for project execution.
Proven professional experience in procurement engineering and handling multiple aspects of the project for its successful execution.
Proven track record of analyzing bills of materials along with understanding project drawings to conclude key project requirements.
